entry.title: Previous Coffee Shop Reviews
entry.content:
I previously wrote a great deal of things for the UTD Mercury, but for easy reading this is a collection of reviews I did for “The Fix”, a coffee shop review column that I’ll be continuing under the name “Practical Caffeine Spots” because:

  1. The Mercury owns the rights to “The Fix” and
  2. Someone else is continuing that particular column there and
  3. I don’t particularly care about having a catchy title for a personal writing project.

I liked writing reviews in that particular style, so I’ll keep doing it for fun.

In case you’d like to read my previous work, it’s linked below:

  • https://utdmercury.com/the-fix-mojos-java-saves-richardson-residents-from-chain-drink-doldrums/
  • https://utdmercury.com/bennys-bagel/
  • https://utdmercury.com/bagel-cafe-21-offers-great-breakfast/
  • https://utdmercury.com/eiland-at-canyon-creek/
  • https://utdmercury.com/dutch-bros-coffee/
  • https://utdmercury.com/dunn-brothers-coffee/
  • https://utdmercury.com/mudleaf-coffee/
  • https://utdmercury.com/communion-coffee/
  • https://utdmercury.com/the-1418-coffeehouse/
  • https://utdmercury.com/i-love-u-a-latte/ (This place was unfortunately closed after an axe attack )
entry.summary: I previously wrote a great deal of things for the UTD Mercury, but for easy reading this is a collection of reviews I did for “The Fix”, a coffee shop review column that I’ll be continuing under the name “Practical Caffeine Spots” because: The Mercury owns the rights to “The Fix” and Someone else is continuing that particular column there and I don’t particularly care about having a catchy title for a personal writing project.
